item.title: Financial stocks are set to shine with the Fed cutting rates, market strategist Lauren Goodwin says

item.title: This nuclear stock is a one-stop shop to play the nuclear power resurgence, CLSA says
item.description: Cameco is a one-stop shop for investors to play the nuclear power resurgence, according to CLSA.

item.title: Reddit is sniffing out a breakout to all-time highs, according to the charts

item.title: CoreWeave shares jump after it starts VC fund to invest in AI companies
item.description: The company, which itself is backed by Nvidia, is the latest example of a tech giant turning to the growing world of AI startups.
